services_intro.title: Our Services
services_intro.description: At OMA Digital, we specialize in designing digital solutions tailored to the needs of African businesses. Our services are designed to deliver concrete, effective and sustainable results. Whether you are a small growing business or a large organization, we have a solution adapted to your needs.

services.title: 🌐 Showcase Website (Standard)
services.description: Modern, fast and secure websites — perfect for businesses, restaurants or personal brands. Integrated with a contact form linked to WhatsApp, a simple database to manage messages or orders, ideal for small businesses wanting to receive orders without complexity.

services.title: 🛒 Essential E-commerce
services.description: Online stores optimized for sales: product management, shopping cart, secure payment (Flutterwave, card, mobile money), and WhatsApp integration for direct orders. Ideal for small shops or creators.

services.title: 📱 Mobile Application (MVP)
services.description: Minimum viable mobile application to quickly test a concept or startup idea. Lightweight but functional version to validate your project before full deployment.

services.title: 🚀 Mobile Application (Standard)
services.description: Complete and performant application with authentication, API, payments, push notifications and advanced integrations. Perfect for businesses and startups wanting a solid and durable app.

services.title: 🤖 Custom AI Chatbot (RAG)
services.description: Intelligent chatbot connected to internal knowledge base (RAG), integrated on your website or WhatsApp. Ideal for automated customer support, FAQ, or business management.

services.title: 💬 Simple Bot (WhatsApp / Telegram)
services.description: Basic chatbot to automate customer responses, order taking, or reservation tracking. Quick, lightweight and effective solution for SMEs.

services.title: ⚙️ AI Automation (Workflow)
services.description: Complete automation of your business processes: email sending, customer reminders, CRM integration, and WhatsApp notifications. Ideal for companies looking to save time.

services.title: 📈 Digital Marketing (Management)
services.description: Complete management of your online visibility: SEO, SEM, social media, monthly reporting and continuous optimization. Ideal for boosting your brand and sales.

services.title: 🎬 Video Creation
services.description: Promotional videos, product storytelling, advertising and visual content for your networks or marketing campaigns.

articles.title: Next.js 14: New App Router Features
articles.excerpt: Discover the new features of Next.js 14 and how the App Router revolutionizes React development.
articles.content:
Next.js 14: New App Router Features Next.js 14 marks an important milestone in the evolution of the most popular React framework. With the App Router now stable, developers can create more performant and maintainable applications. Key New Features Stable App Router: The App Router, introduced experimentally in Next.js 13, is now stable and production-ready. This new routing approach offers folder-based routing that's more intuitive and organized, nested layouts for optimized component reuse, and Server Components by default for improved performance. Turbopack (Alpha): Turbopack, Webpack's successor written in Rust, promises compilation times up to 10x faster. This revolutionary improvement allows developers to see their changes instantly. Server Actions: Server Actions allow executing server-side code directly from client components, dramatically simplifying database and API interactions. Migration from Pages Router Migrating to the App Router requires some structural adjustments: ```javascript // Old: pages/index.js export default function Home() { return

Home

} // New: app/page.js export default function Page() { return

Home

} ``` Key Benefits Improved performance with faster page loading, optimized SEO for better natural referencing, enhanced developer experience with more intuitive development tools, and better scalability through more robust architecture for large applications. Best Practices Start with Server Components and use client components only when needed. Leverage streaming to implement progressive loading. Optimize images using Next.js Image component. Cache strategically by implementing proper caching strategies. Performance Improvements The new architecture provides reduced JavaScript bundle size, better Core Web Vitals scores, improved Time to Interactive (TTI), and enhanced First Contentful Paint (FCP). Next.js 14 with stable App Router represents the future of React development. Teams migrating now will benefit from better performance, improved developer experience, and a more modern architecture for their web projects.
articles.author: Amadou Fall

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content:
Last updated: January 15, 2024

## 1. Introduction

OMA Digital, a company located in Sidi Maarouf, Casablanca – Morocco, is committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with Law 09-08 and international standards. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information.

## 2. Data Collected

We collect the following information:

### Direct data
- Name, first name, email, phone
- Company information
- Messages and quote requests

### Automatic data
- IP address and navigation data
- Technical and analytical cookies
- Security logs

## 3. Data Usage

Your data is used for:

- **Services**: Provide our web, mobile and digital marketing services
- **Communication**: Respond to your requests and inform you
- **Improvement**: Optimize our services and your experience
- **Legal**: Comply with our accounting and tax obligations

## 4. Legal Basis

- **Consent**: Newsletter and marketing
- **Contract**: Execution of our services
- **Legitimate interest**: Improvement and security
- **Legal obligation**: Accounting and taxation

## 5. Data Sharing

We share your data only with:

- **Internal teams**: Authorized OMA Digital personnel
- **Service providers**: Hosting (Vercel, Supabase), Analytics (Google)
- **Authorities**: If required by law

All our partners respect strict data protection obligations.

## 6. Retention

- **Active clients**: Contract duration + 5 years
- **Prospects**: 3 years after last contact
- **Accounting data**: 10 years (legal obligation)
- **Cookies**: 13 months maximum

## 7. Your Rights

You have the following rights:

- **Access**: View your data
- **Rectification**: Correct errors
- **Erasure**: Delete your data
- **Portability**: Retrieve your data
- **Objection**: Refuse certain processing

To exercise your rights: omasenegal25@gmail.com

## 8. Security

We protect your data through:

- SSL/TLS encryption
- Secure authentication
- Regular backups
- Staff training
- Security audits

## 9. Cookies

We use cookies for:

- **Technical**: Site operation
- **Analytics**: Audience measurement (Google Analytics)
- **Preferences**: Memorizing your choices

You can manage cookies via your browser.

## 10. International Transfers

Some data may be transferred to the United States (Google) or EU, with appropriate safeguards (standard contractual clauses).

## 11. Contact

**OMA Digital**
Moustakbal / Sidi Maarouf, Casablanca – Morocco
Email: omasenegal25@gmail.com
Phone: +221 77 143 01 37

## 12. Complaints

In case of dispute, contact CNDP:
- Website: www.cndp.ma
- Email: cndp@cndp.ma

This policy may be modified. Important changes will be notified to you.

terms_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_conditions.content:
Last updated: January 15, 2024

## 1. Company Presentation

OMA Digital is a company specializing in digital services, located in Sidi Maarouf, Casablanca – Morocco. We offer web development, mobile applications, digital marketing and automation solutions.

## 2. Services

**Web Development:**
- Showcase websites: 5,000 DH
- E-commerce: 10,000 DH

**Mobile Applications:**
- MVP: starting from 10,999 DH
- Standard: starting from 20,000 DH

**AI Solutions:**
- AI Chatbot RAG: 10,000 DH + 500 DH/month
- Simple Bot: 3,000 DH + 500 DH/month

**Other Services:**
- Digital Marketing: 3,500 DH/month
- Video Creation: starting from 3,000 DH

## 3. Order and Payment

Every service begins with a free quote. Payment terms: 50% upon signature, 50% upon delivery.

## 4. Obligations

**OMA Digital commits to:**
- Provide services with professionalism
- Respect agreed deadlines
- Ensure information confidentiality

**Client commits to:**
- Provide necessary information
- Respect payment deadlines
- Validate deliverables on time

## 5. Intellectual Property

After full payment, Client obtains usage rights to created works and source code of specific developments.

## 6. Warranties

We guarantee service conformity and proper functioning for 3 months. Our liability is limited to paid amounts.

## 7. Contact

**OMA Digital**
Moustakbal / Sidi Maarouf, Casablanca – Morocco
Email: omasenegal25@gmail.com
Phone: +221 77 143 01 37

cookie_policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie_policy.content:
Last updated: January 15, 2024

## 1. Introduction

This policy explains how OMA Digital uses cookies on www.omadigital.net.

## 2. What is a Cookie?

A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when visiting a website to remember your preferences.

## 3. Types of Cookies Used

**Essential cookies:**
- User session
- CSRF security
- Language preferences
- Cookie consent

**Analytics cookies:**
- Google Analytics (_ga, _gid)
- Traffic and audience measurement

**Functional cookies:**
- Display preferences
- Form saving

**Marketing cookies (with consent):**
- Google Ads
- Facebook Pixel

## 4. Purposes

- User experience improvement
- Traffic and behavior analysis
- Site security
- Content personalization

## 5. Cookie Management

**Via our site:**
- Consent banner
- "Cookie Management" link at bottom of page

**Via your browser:**
- Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security
- Firefox: Settings > Privacy and security
- Safari: Preferences > Privacy

## 6. Consequences of Deactivation

Disabling essential cookies may cause site malfunctions. Analytics cookies help improve our services.

## 7. Retention Period

- Session cookies: Deleted when browser closes
- Persistent cookies: 13 months maximum
- Google Analytics: 26 months

## 8. Contact

**OMA Digital**
Email: omasenegal25@gmail.com
Phone: +221 77 143 01 37
Address: Moustakbal / Sidi Maarouf, Casablanca – Morocco

gdpr_compliance.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr_compliance.content:
Last updated: January 15, 2024

## 1. OMA Digital Commitment

OMA Digital is committed to respecting personal data protection principles according to Law 09-08 and GDPR for our European clients.

## 2. Fundamental Principles

- **Transparency**: Clear information about our practices
- **Purpose**: Collection limited to legitimate needs
- **Proportionality**: Adequate and non-excessive processing
- **Security**: Technical and organizational protection

## 3. Legal Bases

**Consent:** Newsletter, non-essential cookies
**Contract:** Service provision
**Legitimate interest:** Service improvement, security
**Legal obligation:** Accounting, taxation

## 4. Your Rights

- **Access**: View your data
- **Rectification**: Correct errors
- **Erasure**: Delete your data
- **Portability**: Retrieve your data
- **Objection**: Refuse certain processing
- **Restriction**: Suspend processing

## 5. Exercise of Rights

**Contact:**
- Email: omasenegal25@gmail.com

**Response time:** 30 days maximum

## 6. Data Security

**Technical measures:**
- TLS/SSL encryption
- Multi-factor authentication
- Secure backups

**Organizational measures:**
- Staff training
- Security procedures
- Regular audits

## 7. International Transfers

Some data may be transferred to the United States (Google) with appropriate safeguards (standard contractual clauses).

## 8. Data Breach

In case of breach, we notify authorities within 72h and data subjects if high risk.

## 9. DPO

**Amadou Fall**
Data Protection Officer
Email: omasenegal25@gmail.com
Phone: +221 77 143 01 37

## 10. Complaints

**CNDP (Morocco):**
- Website: www.cndp.ma
- Email: cndp@cndp.ma

**CNIL (France):** www.cnil.fr
